name: spirecore
description: SpireCore is a component of SpireStudio responsible for processing and converting logic written in XML into the Rust programming language. It operates as a transpiler that sequentially analyzes the XML structure, interprets block definitions, and executes the instructions assigned to them to generate the resulting source code.

scripts.build-win: npx tsc && npx nexe dist/index.js -t windows-x64-14.15.3 -o dist/spireCore.exe
scripts.build-linux: npx tsc && npx nexe dist/index.js -t linux-x64-14.15.3 -o dist/spireCore
scripts.build-macos: npx tsc && npx nexe dist/index.js -t mac-x64-14.15.3 -o dist/spireCore

author: SourBitStudio
